messages.message:
Welcome to
Index Card RPG: Master Edition!

If you are new to the system you can check out the guide in the Journals section of the sidebar.

Best of luck and have fun with your game!

Official ICRPG:ME module is out!

We are happy to announce that the OFFICIAL module for Index Card RPG is finally out!
Inside you'll find:

  • ALL the content from the book in Journal form
  • More than 1400 items ready to use in your games
  • 70 Monsters and vehicles
  • 60 Rollable Tables
  • 19 Scenes
You can check it out at runehammer.online.
